items.title: Sexy Pop Star Amputee Releases Empowering New Video
items.sub_heading: Viktoria Modesta's new video, "Prototype," is like nothing you've seen before.

metadata.meta_value: Viktoria Modesta's new video, ",Prototype,", is like nothing you've seen before.
Viktoria Modesta Bionic Pop Star-Redefining What We Think Is Sexy

items.abs: Viktoria Modesta's new video, "Prototype," is like nothing you've seen before.
items.body: [image id="159169" loc="C"] As her new video, "Prototype," proclaims in its title, Viktoria Modesta is a new kind of pop star altogether. The 26-year-old Latvian singer is sexy, talented, and an amputee: After undergoing 15 surgeries at a young age to repair a leg that had been damaged at birth, Modesta elected to fully remove the appendage in order to improve her life. [image id="159170" loc="C"]  Six years later, she's singing about her transformation, the freedom her choice has given her, and the fact that she — with her less than mainstream body type — is the model of the future: "Assemble me, piece by piece/Strip away the incomplete, the model of the future/Colliding minds, it's just a start/Feel the sparks, we're building art/It's the vertigo of freedom." [image id="159171" loc="C"] "Forget what you knew about disability" is the message that appears at the start of the video. And she drives that point home throughout the six-minute clip during which we watch her dance like Katy Perry, sport a light-up limb, and take down her enemies with a move plucked from Basic Instinct. Also in the video: the pop star simulating sex like so many other risqué music videos. And as it would be with any of her peers, the most shocking detail is the number of participants involved in the bedroom romp. Modesta's amputated leg, which she displays without any inhibition, is hardly a focal point. [image id="159172" loc="C"] See the full video below: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jA8inmHhx8c[/youtube]
items.notes: Content syndicated via MAGNUS (url: http://www.elle.com/news/culture/viktoria-modesta-bionic-pop-star) to RAMS automagically.
items.short_title: Sexy Pop Star Amputee Releases Empowering New Video

items.title: Sexy Cat Lingerie Is Now a Thing
items.sub_heading: I almost typed that it's "not a thing" but that was just wishful thinking.
items.abs: I almost typed that it's "not a thing" but that was just wishful thinking.

metadata.meta_value: I almost typed that it's "not a thing" but that was just wishful thinking.
Sexy Cat Lingerie Is Now a Thing

items.body: Sexy cat lingerie is now a thing that you can own, thanks to Japan (but of course)! An online store called Felissimo's Nekobu (yes, that translates to "cat club") is selling the "flufeel" lingerie set, complete with detachable penis tail. This is for when you feel sexy and also like a cat. Which, for me, is 75 percent of my waking hours. I'll take one in each color, please! items.title: Sexy Yet Spooky Halloween Makeup Looks

metadata.meta_value: Sexy Yet Spooky Halloween Makeup Looks

editor.ed_bio: I'm Carly Cardellino, the beauty editor here at Cosmopolitan.com. I'll try just about anything once when it comes to beauty, and I have the pictures of my pixie cut to prove it. I'm obsessed with hair products, like volumizers and salt sprays, as well as mascara, nail polish, a good foundation (right now I'm using ELF Cosmetics' BB Cream with SPF 20), and blush (it literally changes the way you look in seconds). Oh, I'm also a self-proclaimed lipstick hoarder. Hopefully you can see why I'm in this business.

items.title: Sexy Schoolgirl-Themed 5K Canceled After Community Backlash
items.sub_heading: The North Carolina race was set to happen in August.
items.abs: The North Carolina race was set to happen in August.

editor.ed_bio: I'm Tess, the editorial assistant at Cosmopolitan.com and the office's bacon aficionado. I've never not been obsessed with Cosmo, so being here is kind of the best. For now, I'm really into news blogging. I am your basic indecisive millennial twentysomething, though, so we'll see. Anyway, I'm always tweeting, always eating, etc., etc. Yay!

metadata.meta_value: The North Carolina race was set to happen in August.
Sexy Schoolgirl-Themed 5K Canceled After Community Backlash

items.body: [image id="121198" loc="L"] A sexy schoolgirl-themed race has been canceled because of community outrage, Raleigh officials announced via Twitter [via NY Daily News]. The 5K, which called for co-eds wearing "suspenders, nerd glasses, skirts and ponytails," was open to male and female participants, but ... what? Raleigh representatives who announced the cancellation of the race have yet to elaborate on what sort of "community opposition" actually took place, but Mary-Ann Baldwin tweeted that the race had been called off by the organizers themselves. RELATED: The Right Way to Tell Your Partner You're Into Kinky Sex Follow Tess on Twitter. Photo Credit: sexyschoolgirl5k.com

imported from MAGNUS article 16931980 AT this link

items.body:
[image id="55841" loc="C"]

Erotic Instructions

You lie faceup on a desk or tabletop with your hips perched on the very edge. Raise your legs to an eye-popping 90-degree angle, then have your guy grab your ankles. He extends his arms out to his sides, and as your legs are spread-eagle, he enters you while standing. Next, he starts alternately crossing and spreading your legs like scissors, opening and closing as he thrusts.

Carnal Challenge

[rating score="5"]

Why You'll Love It

No other love lock will offer you such a body-rockin' range of sensations. One second your limbs are in an erotic X and you're supertight for a snug fit — then suddenly you're wide open and able to take him in deliciously deep. We guarantee these thigh-melting maneuvers will lead to a whoa-baby wave of Os.

Cosmo Hint

Since your hands are totally free to roam, you can give him one hell of a show by sensually caressing your breasts. Or give yourself a hand and stroke your clitoris to add yet another mind-melting sensation to the already bliss-inducing mix. Get our updated edition of The Cosmo Kama Sutra: 77 Mind-Blowing Sex Positions, now!

items.body:
[image id="67103" loc="C"]

Erotic Instructions

Save this position for a day (or night) when you two have the backyard to yourselves. Stand beside a soft-spraying sprinkler and bend over so the water hits your genitals. If you can't reach your hands to the ground, place them on your thighs or calves for support. Your partner should stand behind you and put his hands around your waist as he enters you.

Carnal Challenge

[rating score="3"]

Why You'll Love It

The sprinkler provides the same kind of clitoral stimulation as a handheld nozzle (see The Rub-a-Dub). And the aroma of wet grass boosts your sense of smell, making this a supersensory experience.

Cosmo Hint

Instead of keeping the sprinkler on the stationary setting, switch it to rotate so you get a bliss-inducing blast all over your body. Get our updated edition of The Cosmo Kama Sutra: 77 Mind-Blowing Sex Positions, now!

items.title: Sexy Halloween Costume Ideas
items.sub_heading: We freaking love Halloween. You get to play dress-up and eat loads of candy—awesome. Of course, we know you still want to look good on the big day. That's why we rounded up Halloween costume ideas that are sexy without going OTT. So you can haunt his dreams and then some.

metadata.meta_value: We rounded up Halloween costume ideas that are seriously sexy without going OTT. So you can haunt his dreams and then some.
halloween, halloween costume, costumes, sexy costume ideas
Sexy Halloween Costumes - Good Halloween Costume Ideas 2013

items.abs: We rounded up Halloween costume ideas that are seriously sexy without going OTT. So you can haunt his dreams and then some.

subsection.meta_keywords: fashion, style, fashion tips, celebrity fashion, fashion trends, what to wear, celebrity style
subsection.meta_description: Learn how to dress for your body type, what to wear on a date, and where to shop on a budget Get the latest fashion trends for less with our fun, fearless fashion tips.
subsection.meta_title: Fashion and Style - Celebrity Fashion Trends - Cosmopolitan

items.body: No There's nothing particularly sexy about Duck Dynasty , but that doesn't mean you can't make it that way. This curve-clinging camo creation brings out the sexy side of...duck calling? Camo Cutie Costume costume, $67.95, PartyCity.com Courtesy Image Magnus Camo Cutie Image Nothing No There's so much sexy involved in switching to the darkside. This scandalous Darth Vader costume says it all. Sexy Darth Vader costume, $55.95, Hollywood.com halloweencostumes.com Magnus Image Nothing Mermaids are inherently sexy, but why not go even farther? Add a bustier and a slinky skirt that has legs for days and you have one hell of a costume. Mesmerizing Mermaid Costume, $169.95, PartyCity.com partycity.com Magnus Image Nothing It's starting to get cold and just the idea of anything exotic is wonderful. Bring those daydreams of paradise to every man's reality and embrace the Hula girl costume this Halloween. Adult Hula Costume, $49.99, PartyCity.com partycity.com Magnus Image Nothing The sexy firefighter is a go-to Halloween classic. You can play with fire in so many different ways! Sexy Firefighter Costume, $55.99, AmIClubWear.com amiclubwear.com Magnus Image Nothing No Um…Max and Caroline's diner uniforms are crazy-hot. We couldn't find exact replicas online, but you could get this dress (or something similar), add two red stripes down the front and red bands around the sleeves, then tie on a red apron and voila! Soda Fountain Dress in ginger, $44.99. ModCloth.com Courtesy Image Magnus 2 Broke Girls Image Nothing You better believe your man has caught one—or a zillion—of those sexy GoDaddy.com ads. Live out his fantasy in this look. Danica Patrick costume, $45, Amazon.com Courtesy Image Magnus Danica Patrick Image Nothing With a sexy plunge neckline and form-fitting jumpsuit, this costume will have men hitting on you all night. Bon Voyage sailor costume, $30.16, Amazon.com Courtesy Image Magnus A Sailor Image Nothing Sookie's waitress uniform might look innocent, but we all know what happens on True Blood... True Blood costume, $36.54, Target.com Courtesy Image Magnus Sookie Stackhouse Image Nothing If a man was born sometime in the last century, he's had a Princess Leia fantasy. Ahem Princess Leia costume, $30.96, Amazon.com Courtesy Image Magnus Princess Leia Image Nothing You'd be hard-pressed to find a man who didn't love playing with soldiers when he was little. And, really, that urge never goes away… . Retro Army dress costume, $35.99, Amazon.com Courtesy Image Magnus A Soldier Image Nothing Let's hear it for old-school cartoons! This little apron will showcase your legs and waist. Throw it on over a blue long-sleeved shirt, and add boots with scrunched down rainbow-colored socks. Hot. Rainbow Brite apron, $55, Etsy.com Courtesy Image Magnus Rainbow Brite Image Nothing We couldn't tear our eyes away from Anne Hathaway in The Dark Knight Rises. You can have the same effect on people with this sizzling Catwoman costume. Catwoman costume, $49.99, PartyCity.com Courtesy Image Magnus Catwoman Image Nothing We don't care how long it's been since Lynda Carter rocked this outfit on TV. Wonder Woman will never not be hot. Wonder Woman costume, $21, Amazon.com Courtesy Image Magnus Wonder Woman Image Nothing Sure, you could throw a sheet over your head and call it a day, but we like this form-fitting option way better. Ghost dress, $89.95, Etsy.com Courtesy Image Magnus A Ghost Image Nothing
